about_the_game:
Spread the Bread DLC expands your farm 🏡 with a mill 🌾, two new NPCs 👨‍🌾👩‍🌾, and grain-to-flour processing. Bake bread 🥖, ferment sourdough 🍞, and grow rapeseed, strawberries, cucumbers, and tomatoes 🌻🍓🥒🍅. Raise geese and ducks 🦆, craft jams 🍯, and enjoy new recipes 🍽️. Plus, numerous fixes 🔧 and improvements!

🌾 New Mill Location: Explore a brand-new mill area 🏭, interact with two unique characters 👨‍🌾👩‍🌾, and engage in quests 📜 centered around grain processing. Transform your harvested grains 🌾 into flour, adding depth to your farming operations.

🍞 Baking Bread and Pastries: Utilize your freshly milled flour to bake a variety of bread 🥖 and pastries 🥐. Experience the authentic process of sourdough fermentation, bringing traditional baking methods to your farm.

🌱 Cultivation of New Crops: Expand your agricultural repertoire by growing rapeseed 🌻, strawberries 🍓, cucumbers 🥒, and tomatoes 🍅. These additions offer new farming challenges and opportunities to diversify your produce.

🦆 Raising Geese and Ducks: Introduce geese and ducks 🦆 to your farmstead. Care for these new animals to obtain valuable resources 🥚 and enhance the liveliness of your farm.

🍯 Jam Production and New Recipes: Harvest your fruits 🍏 to produce delicious jams 🍯. Experiment with new recipes 🍽️ that incorporate your homemade preserves, adding a sweet touch to your culinary creations.

🔧 Numerous Fixes and Enhancements: Benefit from a multitude of improvements ✅ and optimizations ⚙️ that enhance gameplay, ensuring a smoother and more enjoyable farming experience.

This DLC builds upon the foundation laid by the base game, "Farmer's Life," and its first expansion, "Pimp my Cottage," which introduced extensive interior and exterior design options, new building structures, and the addition of cats and dogs to your farm.

With "Spread the Bread," immerse yourself further into the rural lifestyle, mastering new skills and managing additional farm activities.
